text: Kundara East railway station (Code: KFV) is a railway station situated in Kundara town in Kollam, Kerala. Kundara East railway station falls under the Madurai railway division of the Southern Railway Zone, Indian Railways.Kerala to conduct survey of 14 railway overbridges The station is one of two railway stations in the industrial town of Kundara.Major train accident averted at Kundara Other one is Kundara railway station. ==Services== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders unsortable"
